# Example Assignment
This is an example assignment for demonstration purposes. It includes a brief description and some basic instructions.
## Instructions
1. Read the provided materials. 2. Complete the tasks outlined in the assignment. 3. Submit your work by the due date. 4. Ensure that your submission meets the specified requirements. 5. Review the grading rubric to understand how your work will be evaluated.
## Submission Guidelines
- Submit your assignment in the specified format (e.g., PDF, Word document). - Ensure that your submission is complete and adheres to the guidelines provided. - Late submissions may incur penalties as outlined in the course syllabus. - If you have any questions, please reach out to the instructor before the due date.
## Rubric
| Criteria | Points | |-----------------|--------| | Understanding | 10 | | Completeness | 10 | | Clarity | 10 | | Timeliness | 10 | | Total | 40 |
